title: E8 Our First Fight and Franzia Stains…or Blood?
description: Episode 8 has arrived! Em tells Christine about the Queen Mary (and is pretty pissed that Christine went without her) and Christine tells Em the story of Maura Murray’s mysterious disappearance.
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
